Class ForgottenPasswordController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.ForgottenPasswordController
@Controller public class ForgottenPasswordController extends Object
Controller class for the forgot password functionality
Author:
Josh Gearhart jjg1018@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • forgotPassword

      @GetMapping("/forgotpassword") public String forgotPassword()
      Used to handle the request and shows the user the form
      Returns:
      forgotpasswordform - the form the user will fill out to recieve a link

    • forgotPasswordForm

      @PostMapping("/forgotpassword") public String forgotPasswordForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      Method for handling the input from the user and sending the userfound a reset password email
      Parameters:
      model - - used to output messages to the user
      request - - used to get the email from the form
      Returns:
      forgotpasswordform - this will ensure that the model displays the message
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException
      javax.mail.MessagingException

    • resetPassword

      @GetMapping("/resetpassword") public String resetPassword(@RequestParam(required=true,value="code") String otpCode, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      method that finds the user by their OTP code, if the user does not have the same code they will not be able to proceed
      Parameters:
      otpCode - - passed in the URL, used for finding the user
      model - - used to output messages to the user
      Returns:
      forgotpassword or resetpasword form

    • resetPasswordForm

      @PostMapping("/resetpassword") public String resetPasswordForm(@ModelAttribute("userForm") User userForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttr)
      Method that takes in the password and code and resets the users password
      Parameters:
      userForm - - Used to hold the users password
      bindingResult - - Used to validate the password held from userForm
      request - - used to recieve the otpCode and the password
      model - - used to send messages back to the user
      redirectAttr - - Used to add flash Attributes for binding result and userForm
      Returns:
      resetpasswordform - used to display the messages
